T02TD1983E:166a-1: mandala bi dhi: / bod skad du /
T02TD1983E:166b-0: dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga / dpal gshin rje @166b gshed po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1983E:166b-2: dam tshig dang rang gi brtul zhugs bsrung ba /
T02TD1983E:166b-3: rnam par rtog pa med cing rgyud gcig pa /
T02TD1983E:166b-4: bla ma dang rdo rje 'jigs byed la mos pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i slob mas /
T02TD1983E:166b-5: dang por dkyil 'khor dang tshogs kyi mchod pa chen po byas nas /
T02TD1983E:166b-6: bla ma la gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02TD1983E:166b-7: de nas bla ma khro ba med pa /
T02TD1983E:166b-8: sngags dang rgyud la mkhas pa /
T02TD1983E:166b-9: thos pa'i pha rol tu son pa /
T02TD1983E:166b-12: sdom pa la gnas pa des /
T02TD1983E:166b-13: dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams bskyed pa dang /
T02TD1983E:166b-14: mnyes pa la thug pa byas nas yi ge bcu pa'i snying po 'bum phrag gcig tu bzlas pa bya ste /
T02TD1983E:166b-17: dur khrod chu bu'i 'gram dag dang //
T02TD1983E:166b-18: shing gcig drung dang mtshan ma gcig / lam gyi bzhi mdo'i ri bo'i steng //
T02TD1983E:166b-19: khang stong dang ni ma mo'i gnas //
T02TD1983E:166b-20: lha gnas 'thab mo'i gnas dag dang //
T02TD1983E:166b-21: grong 'dab dang ni nags kyi khrod //
T02TD1983E:166b-22: ces gsungs pa'i gnas gang yang rung bar song nas bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i sngags bzlas pa'i chus gtor te /
T02TD1983E:166b-23: der dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams bsam par byas nas mchod pa dang gtor ma bya ste /
T02TD1983E:166b-24: sa'i lha mo la bslang ba ni /
T02TD1983E:166b-25: skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD1983E:166b-26: spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par dang ;
T02TD1983E:166b-27: / sa dang pha rol phyin pa la //
T02TD1983E:166b-28: lha mo khyod ni dpang du gyur //
T02TD1983E:166b-29: skyob pa sh'akya seng ge yis //
T02TD1983E:166b-30: ji ltar bdud kyi tshogs bcom pa //
T02TD1983E:166b-31: de ltar bdag gis bdud bcom nas //
T02TD1983E:166b-33: ces brjod nas thal mo sa la brdab pas /
T02TD1983E:166b-34: sa'i lha mo sku phyed tsam sa las 'thon pa dang /
T02TD1983E:166b-35: sems can gyi don du dkyil 'khor byed pas bdag las byin cig ces brjod pa las /
T02TD1983E:166b-36: khyod dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po yin pas /
T02TD1983E:166b-37: dkyil 'khor gyis shig ces brjod nas /
T02TD1983E:166b-38: slar yang sa la thim par bsam mo //
T02TD1983E:166b-41: // / de nas bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i rnal 'byor du byas te /
T02TD1983E:166b-42: sa'i lha mo nam mkhar gshegs par bsams la sa brko ste /
T02TD1983E:166b-44: der rin po che lnga dang 'bru lnga dang ldan pa'i bum pa bcug la rang gi sas dgang ngo //
T02TD1983E:166b-45: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi sa nyis 'gyur du spos kyis chag chag dang /
T02TD1983E:167a-2: de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug nas /
T02TD1983E:167a-3: stong pa nyid sngon du 'gro ba'i lha'i nga rgyal byas te /
T02TD1983E:167a-4: sa gzhi thams cad stong pa'i rang bzhin las /
T02TD1983E:167a-5: h'um las rdo rje'i sa gzhir bsgoms nas de'i dbus su rang gi lhag pa'i lha'i nga rgyal du gnas par byas la /
T02TD1983E:167a-6: slob ma lha'i nga rgyal can dag gis dkyil 'khor bri bar gsol ba gdab par byas nas /
T02TD1983E:167a-7: rdo rje slob dpon gyis mig tu ma las grub pa'i nyi ma 'bar ba dang /
T02TD1983E:167a-8: aa las grub pa'i zla ba 'od zer dang ldan pa bsam /
T02TD1983E:167a-9: rkang pa'i 'og tu h'um las rdo rje rgya gram 'od 'bar ba bsgoms nas /
T02TD1983E:167a-10: langs te byang shar gyi mtshams nas bskor ba byas te rdo rje'i lta ba dang /
T02TD1983E:167a-11: rdo rje'i 'gros kyis bgegs gzhom par bya'o //
T02TD1983E:167a-12: de nas yang dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug nas /
T02TD1983E:167a-13: gshin rje gshed kyi nga rgyal du byas te /
T02TD1983E:167a-14: de'i snying gar gnas pa'i sa bon las byung ba'i khro bo'i phur pa bskyed nas bdag gis ske nas bzung bas phyogs bcu'i bgegs dag la gdab par bya'o //
T02TD1983E:167a-15: aom gha gha gh'a ta ya gh'a ta ya /
T02TD1983E:167a-16: sarba du sht'ra na phat phat /
T02TD1983E:167a-17: k'i la ya k'i ya la ya sarba p'a pam phat phat /
T02TD1983E:167a-18: h'um h'um h'um badzra k'i la ya /
T02TD1983E:167a-19: badzra dha rod a'a dzny'a pa ya ti /
T02TD1983E:167a-20: k'a ya w'a ka tsitta badzra k'i la ya h'um phat /
T02TD1983E:167a-21: ces bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i sngags kyis gdab par bya'o //
T02TD1983E:167a-24: // / de nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su /
T02TD1983E:167a-25: khru gang ba'i dkyil 'khor zlum por byas nas //
T02TD1983E:167a-26: lha'i grangs dang mnyam pa'i thig le dri dang ldan par bya ste /
T02TD1983E:167a-27: me tog re dbus su bzhag pa gdan du dbul bar byas nas ;
T02TD1983E:167a-28: 'khor lo'i rang bzhin bskyed pa dang /
T02TD1983E:167a-29: dang po bsnyen pa'i dus na spyan drangs pa'i lha rnams mdun gyi nam mkha' la bzhugs pa rnams der spyan drangs te /
T02TD1983E:167a-30: mchod pa dang bstod pa byas te /
T02TD1983E:167a-32: bcom ldan 'jam dpal rdo rje ni //
T02TD1983E:167a-33: rig sngags bdag po phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD1983E:167a-34: snying rje yid kyis dkyil 'khor bri //
T02TD1983E:167a-35: de phyir byin rlabs gnang bar mdzod //
T02TD1983E:167a-36: dgongs shig sangs rgyas sde dang tshogs /
T02TD1983E:167a-37: gang gzhan sngags kyi lha tshogs dang //
T02TD1983E:167a-38: lha rnams bstan la mngon dga' ba'i //
T02TD1983E:167a-39: dkyil 'khor byin rlabs dngos grub mdzod //
T02TD1983E:167b-0: ces lan @167b gsum brjod de lha gnas pa'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1983E:167b-1: de nas dngul lam gser gyi bum pa kha dog dkar por bsgyur ba lha'i grangs dang mnyam pa ste dgu dang /
T02TD1983E:167b-2: las byed pa dang bcu po de dag tshang bar byas la /
T02TD1983E:167b-3: dgu la sna tshogs padma'i steng du rang gi mtshan ma bri bar bya'o //
T02TD1983E:167b-4: las byed pa'i bum par padma'i lha la sna tshogs rdo rje bri bar bya'o //
T02TD1983E:167b-5: gtso bo'i bum par 'bru lnga dang /
T02TD1983E:167b-6: rin po che sna lnga dang /
T02TD1983E:167b-8: dri chab bzang pos dgang bar bya'o //
T02TD1983E:167b-9: gzhan dag tu yang dri'i chus dgang bar bya'o //
T02TD1983E:167b-11: shing bzang po'i lo mas kha rgyan bya'o //
T02TD1983E:167b-12: de nas gtso bo'i bum par padma'i steng du cho ga gsum pa las gtso bo'i sku bskyed /
T02TD1983E:167b-13: phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan par bya /
T02TD1983E:167b-14: ye shes kyi gtso bo bkug la gzhug / mchod pa dang bstod pa bzlas pa bya /
T02TD1983E:167b-15: de nas snying ga'i sa bon las byung ba'i 'od zer gyis bkug pa'i sangs rgyas dang bcas pa bdud rtsi chu'i rang bzhin du zhu bar bya'o //
T02TD1983E:167b-16: de nas bum pa gzhan du yang de bzhin du bskyed pa dang /
T02TD1983E:167b-19: zhu bar byas te gzhag go //
T02TD1983E:167b-20: las byed pa'i bum par padma'i steng du bskyed pa'i las thams cad pa'i khro bo bskyed pa dang /
T02TD1983E:167b-22: mchod pa yan chad byas nas bzlas pa byas la zhu bar mi bya ste /
T02TD1983E:167b-23: de nas bum pa de dag rang gi khang par sba bar bya ste /
T02TD1983E:167b-24: bum pa gnas pa'i rim pa'o /
T02TD1983E:167b-26: // / de nas slob ma shar ngos su mandala bya ste /
T02TD1983E:167b-28: rdo rje slob dpon gyi gtso bo'i nga rgyal byas pa la gsol ba gdab pa /
T02TD1983E:167b-29: ston pa khyod la bdag dga'o //
T02TD1983E:167b-30: slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol //
T02TD1983E:167b-31: byang chub chen po'i tshul chen ni //
T02TD1983E:167b-32: mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1983E:167b-33: de nyid dam tshig rim pa dang //
T02TD1983E:167b-34: byang chub sems kyang bdag la stsol //
T02TD1983E:167b-35: gsum pa skyabs su 'gro ba stsol //
T02TD1983E:167b-36: thar pa chen po'i grong khyer du //
T02TD1983E:167b-37: mgon pas bdag ni gzhug par mdzod //
T02TD1983E:167b-39: de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis slob ma'i lag pa nas bzung ste /
T02TD1983E:167b-40: bu gcig 'dir shog theg chen gyi //
T02TD1983E:167b-41: cho ga sngags kyi spyod pa'i tshul //
T02TD1983E:167b-42: khyod la yang dag bstan par bya //
T02TD1983E:167b-43: khyod kyis tshul chen rnyed par gyis //
T02TD1983E:168a-2: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can //
T02TD1983E:168a-3: dpag med ye shes thob pa ni //
T02TD1983E:168a-4: rdo rje gsang sngags smos pa ni //
T02TD1983E:168a-5: gang zhig mnyam med sngags sbyor bas //
T02TD1983E:168a-6: sh'akya seng ge skyob pa yis //
T02TD1983E:168a-7: drag po bdud kyi sde bcom nas //
T02TD1983E:168a-8: 'jig rten mthun par chos kyi ni //
T02TD1983E:168a-10: de phyir blo ldan bu khyod kyis //
T02TD1983E:168a-11: thams cad mkhyen pa'i don thob kyis //
T02TD1983E:168a-13: de nas bya ba'i rgyud la sogs pa dang thun mong gi sdom pa dang /
T02TD1983E:168a-14: rnal 'byor gyi rgyud bla na med pa'i phas pham pa bcu bzhi dang /
T02TD1983E:168a-15: sdom pa sbom po drug la sogs pa dag kyang dgod par bya'o //
T02TD1983E:168a-16: de nas slob ma'i gnas gsum dri'i thig le re re byas te /
T02TD1983E:168a-20: de dag gi lte bar sa bon gsum bsam zhing /
T02TD1983E:168a-21: aom a'a: h'um zhes pas gnas gsum du rdo rje gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD1983E:168a-22: de nas so shing me tog gi phreng ba can bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i sngags kyis btab pa sbyin par byas nas /
T02TD1983E:168a-23: slob mas rang gi so'i rtsa ba dag brud nas /
T02TD1983E:168a-24: dkyil 'khor gyi steng du dor te /
T02TD1983E:168a-25: zhi ba la sogs pa'i las dang dngos grub kyi rtags dag shes par bya'o //
T02TD1983E:168a-26: srung skud la bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i sngags kyis mdud pa por te /
T02TD1983E:168a-27: dpung pa g-yon par gdags par bya'o //
T02TD1983E:168a-28: de nas ku sha las thams cad pa'i sngags kyis btab pa byin la sngas su byas /
T02TD1983E:168a-29: shar lho'i mtshams su mgo bstan zhing nyal /
T02TD1983E:168a-30: rmi lam gyi ltas brtag par bya'o //
T02TD1983E:168a-31: slob ma gnas pa'i rim pa'o /
T02TD1983E:168a-33: // / de nas nang par sngar spyan drangs pa'i sngags kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mdun gyi nam mkha' la gshegs su gsol nas thig gi las bya ste /
T02TD1983E:168a-34: tshon sna lnga'i skud pas so sor bskal pa la /
T02TD1983E:168a-35: stong pa nyid sngon du 'gro bas yi ge lnga las byung bar bsam /
T02TD1983E:168a-36: de nas de dag gcig tu bsgril la dri dang bdud rtsi lnga blugs /
T02TD1983E:168a-38: aom a'a: h'um rim par bkod de /
T02TD1983E:168a-39: dam tshig gi skud pa'i rim pa'o /
T02TD1983E:168a-41: // / de nas mdun gyi nam mkha' la bzhugs pa'i rigs lnga'i thugs gnas ye shes kyi skud pa 'od du 'bar ba bsams te /
T02TD1983E:168a-42: rang gi mig gnyis su nyi ma bsams la de'i steng du dza: dmar po bsam /
T02TD1983E:168b-0: de @168b nas mig gi rdzi ma lheb lheb byed pas ye shes kyi skud pa dza:sa drangs nas dam tshig gi skud par gzhug / de nas mchod pa lnga dbul lo //
T02TD1983E:168b-1: ye shes kyi skud pa'i rim pa'o /
T02TD1983E:168b-3: // / de nas mchod pa dang gtor ma byas te /
T02TD1983E:168b-4: bskul ba dang bcas te bsgril bar bya'o //
T02TD1983E:168b-5: de nas rdo rje slob dpon nub tu 'dug nas /
T02TD1983E:168b-6: rdo rje khu tshur g-yon pas bzung la /
T02TD1983E:168b-7: gtso bor bsgoms pa'i lte bar khu tshur bzhag la /
T02TD1983E:168b-8: dza dza dza gsum gyis slob ma'i lag mthil du g-yas pas drangs te byin la tshangs thig dang po gdab /
T02TD1983E:168b-9: aom badzra sa ma ya s'u tra ma ti kra ma h'um /
T02TD1983E:168b-10: zhes gyen du btab pa'i sgras de bzhin gshegs pa dag 'gro ba'i don gyi dus la bab par bskul /
T02TD1983E:168b-11: de nas tshangs thig gnyis pa yang de bzhin du gdab par bya'o //
T02TD1983E:168b-12: de nas kha dog gcig pa'i skud pa las thams cad par byin gyis brlabs pas sa'i thig btab la /
T02TD1983E:168b-13: thig de'i steng du ye shes lnga'i thig btab la /
T02TD1983E:168b-14: snga ma'i thig byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02TD1983E:168b-15: de nas ye shes kyi thig la mchod pa byas slar yang gshegs su gsol lo //
T02TD1983E:168b-16: de nas las kyi thig ni /
T02TD1983E:168b-17: dang por sa la tshangs thig dang po btab la /
T02TD1983E:168b-18: der bya rog rjes gnyis bri'o //
T02TD1983E:168b-19: de nas gnyis pa btab ste /
T02TD1983E:168b-20: zur bzhir bya rog rjes bri ste /
T02TD1983E:168b-21: dang por kun gyi thig shar du gdab /
T02TD1983E:168b-25: de nas me dang rlung gi grvar /
T02TD1983E:168b-26: de nas bden bral dang dbang ldan gyi grvar gdab bo //
T02TD1983E:168b-27: de nas shar gyi tshangs pa'i thig nas lhor tshangs pa'i thig gi snar gdab bo //
T02TD1983E:168b-28: de nas de bzhin du lho nas nub tu /
T02TD1983E:168b-30: byang nas kyang shar gyi tshangs thig tu gdab bo //
T02TD1983E:168b-31: de nas nang gi bya rjes bzhir thig bzhag nas /
T02TD1983E:168b-32: nang gi ngos bzhir btab pas ni pho brang dang /
T02TD1983E:168b-34: rta babs kyi snam bur gsal bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1983E:168b-35: de nas snam bu bzhi po de re re la snam bu bzhi bzhir bgos te /
T02TD1983E:168b-36: cha chen po bcu drug tu bya'o //
T02TD1983E:168b-37: de re re la yang cha chung bzhi bzhir bgo bar bya'o //
T02TD1983E:168b-38: thig de dag gi cha rnam par bgos te /
T02TD1983E:168b-39: dbus kyi pho brang zlum po dang grva dang sgo la sogs pa kun char bgo bar bya ste /
T02TD1983E:168b-42: // / de nas tshon sna lnga rim par bzhag ste /
T02TD1983E:168b-43: stong pa nyid sngon du 'gro bas yi ge lnga las bskyed de /
T02TD1983E:169a-1: du ye shes kyi tshon mig gi tshon la bstim ste /
T02TD1983E:169a-2: aom badzra tsi tra sa ma ya stvam /
T02TD1983E:169a-4: de nas byang shar mtshams su dkar ba dang nang nas drangs te mdzub gang bla ma'i lag pa g-yon pas bris la chos kyi dbyings de dag pas na /
T02TD1983E:169a-5: sems can khams ni rab sgrol byed //
T02TD1983E:169a-6: rgyal ba 'jam dpal rdo rje nyid //
T02TD1983E:169a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas //
T02TD1983E:169a-8: zhes brjod nas zangs gzhong la sogs pas dgab par bya'o //
T02TD1983E:169a-9: de nas dbus nas bri bar bya ste /
T02TD1983E:169a-10: rgyud nyid las ji skad gsungs pa ni /
T02TD1983E:169a-11: nam phyed kyi ni dus dag tu //
T02TD1983E:169a-12: ma he'i gdong gi sbyor ldan pas //
T02TD1983E:169a-13: gcer bu skra ni lhug par byas //
T02TD1983E:169a-14: dur khrod sol ba la sogs pas //
T02TD1983E:169a-15: dkyil 'khor dag ni bri bar bya //
T02TD1983E:169a-16: gru bzhi pa dang sgo bzhi pa //
T02TD1983E:169a-17: rta babs bzhi dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD1983E:169a-18: dril bu dang ni 'phan la sogs //
T02TD1983E:169a-19: me tog phreng ba rnams kyis brgyan //
T02TD1983E:169a-20: grva rnams dang ni sgo khyud dang //
T02TD1983E:169a-21: rdo rje rin chen spras pa dang //
T02TD1983E:169a-22: de bzhin zla ba phyed pa'o//
T02TD1983E:169a-23: de dbus 'khor lo bri ba ni //
T02TD1983E:169a-24: re mig dgu pa zlum po ste //
T02TD1983E:169a-25: sgo gcig dag tu 'dug nas su //
T02TD1983E:169a-26: gzhan gyi sgo rnams gcad par bya //
T02TD1983E:169a-27: zhes gsungs pa de bzhin du bri bar bya ste /
T02TD1983E:169a-28: dbus lte ba zlum po re mig dgu pa /
T02TD1983E:169a-29: de'i phyir gru bzhi pa sgo bzhi pa /
T02TD1983E:169a-34: mtshan ma bri bar dgod pa yang de'i dbus su ro bri bar bya'o //
T02TD1983E:169a-39: shar gyi grvar ka p'a la /
T02TD1983E:169a-40: lho'i grvar thod pa'i dum bu //
T02TD1983E:169a-41: nub kyi grvar dur khrod kyi ras /
T02TD1983E:169a-42: byang gi grvar mdung gi phug pa'i skyes bu'o //
T02TD1983E:169a-43: 'di dag nang gi mtshan ma ste /
T02TD1983E:169a-44: de nas phyi rol phyag rgya dgod /
T02TD1983E:169a-45: shar gyi snam bur ni gri gug dang /
T02TD1983E:169a-50: lcags kyu la sogs pa bri bar bya'o //
T02TD1983E:169a-51: lho'i snam bu la sta re dang /
T02TD1983E:169a-56: rdo rje zhags pa la sogs pa bri bar bya'o //
T02TD1983E:169a-57: nub tu ni rdo rje dang /
T02TD1983E:169a-62: rlung gis bskyod pa'i ras la sogs pa bri bar bya'o //
T02TD1983E:169a-63: byang du ni sdigs mdzub dang /
T02TD1983E:169b-2: me thab la sogs bri bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa bzhin bri bar bya'o //
T02TD1983E:169b-3: khyad par du ni sgo bzhi dang /
T02TD1983E:169b-4: grva bzhir sna tshogs padma'i steng du gri gug bri bar bya'o //
T02TD1983E:169b-5: dbus su yang ro'i steng du padma'i steng du gri gug bri bar bya'o //
T02TD1983E:169b-9: // / de nas bum pa dgod de /
T02TD1983E:169b-10: gtso bo'i dbus su bzhag / gzhan dgu las /
T02TD1983E:169b-11: las kyi bum pa byang shar du bzhag ste /
T02TD1983E:169b-12: khyod kyis bgegs bsrung bar gyis shig ces brjod nas /
T02TD1983E:169b-13: bighn'a ta kri ta bzlas so //
T02TD1983E:169b-15: dang po lha mo bsgom pa de'i sa phyogs sgo dang grva bzhir gzhag go ;
T02TD1983E:169b-16: / de nas mchod rdzas ni mi dang /
T02TD1983E:169b-22: glang po la sogs pa dang /
T02TD1983E:169b-30: ne tso la sogs pa'i sha las byas pa'i lha bshos brgyad phyogs mtshams su gzhag / tshil chen po'i mar khu'i mar me brgyad kyang de bzhin du gzhag / sgo bzhi dang grva bzhir khrag sna tshogs pa'i dmar gyi aargha thod pa brgyad gang ba gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD1983E:169b-31: ma h'a mam sa'i dh'u pe dang /
T02TD1983E:169b-32: me tog gi snod brgyad dag kyang phyogs mtshams su gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD1983E:169b-33: slob ma dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i dus na grangs dang mthun pa'i gtor ma dang /
T02TD1983E:169b-34: gzhan yang lha rnams la dbul ba'i tshogs kyi rdzas dang /
T02TD1983E:169b-36: ras zung dang bcas pa yang bzhag ste /
T02TD1983E:169b-39: // / de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis dkyil 'khor gyi cha rkyen thams cad phun sum tshogs par shes nas /
T02TD1983E:169b-40: rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor la 'jug par bya ste /
T02TD1983E:169b-41: dang po gnod mdzes kyis bgegs bsal ba'i sbyor ba sngon du byas nas de nas bla ma'i mchod pa dang /
T02TD1983E:169b-43: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi yan lag bsgom pa dang /
T02TD1983E:169b-44: 'byung ba rim pa brtsegs dang gzhal yas khang la sogs pa bsgom pa dang /
T02TD1983E:169b-45: dam tshig gi 'khor lo bskyed pa dang /
T02TD1983E:169b-46: ye shes kyi 'khor lo spyan drangs pa la mnyes par bya ba dang /
T02TD1983E:169b-47: mthar snying gar bsdu ba byas nas /
T02TD1983E:169b-50: rtogs pas nang du yongs su tshim par byas te /
T02TD1983E:170a-2: de nas stong pa nyid bsgom pa sngon du 'gro bas dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa'i phyir rdo rje slob dpon gyis bsgom par bya ste /
T02TD1983E:170a-3: ye shes kyi 'khor lo dang 'dres par gyur nas /
T02TD1983E:170a-7: ras zung thams cad kyang dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD1983E:170a-10: // / de nas slob ma phyi rol du gnas pa de'i drung du bla mas las kyi bum pa khyer te /
T02TD1983E:170a-11: bighn'a ta kri ta ces brjod cing phyin te /
T02TD1983E:170a-12: de rnams par snang mdzad du byin gyis brlabs nas /
T02TD1983E:170a-14: zhes pas me tog gi phreng ba len du gzhug go //
T02TD1983E:170a-15: de nas dar dmar po ma rmas pas mig dgab par byas la chus gtor ro //
T02TD1983E:170a-16: de nas yol ba'i phyi rol du bkug la dri bar bya ste /
T02TD1983E:170a-17: kye de na gnas pa'i de su zhig ces bya'o //
T02TD1983E:170a-18: skal ba bzang po bdag lags so zhes so //
T02TD1983E:170a-19: de nas byang chub tu sems bskyed par byas te /
T02TD1983E:170a-20: aom bo dhi tsitta autp'a da y'a mi ;
T02TD1983E:170a-21: zhes brjod nas yol ba'i nang du bkug pa la 'di brjod do //
T02TD1983E:170a-22: dus 'di nyid du khyod nyid ni //
T02TD1983E:170a-23: sangs rgyas rigs su chud pas na //
T02TD1983E:170a-24: nga yis ye shes rdo rje sbyin //
T02TD1983E:170a-25: des na sangs rgyas 'grub par gsungs //
T02TD1983E:170a-26: gang zhig 'di nyid ma mthong ba'i //
T02TD1983E:170a-27: mdun du smra bar smra bar ma byed cig / bag med smras nyams par 'gyur //
T02TD1983E:170a-28: de bas nan tan gnas par bya'o //
T02TD1983E:170a-29: zhes snying gar rdo rje bzung la smra bar bya'o //
T02TD1983E:170a-30: de nas rdo rje spyi bor bzhag la /
T02TD1983E:170a-31: gtam 'di smra bar ma byed cig / gal te gzhan la smras gyur na //
T02TD1983E:170a-32: klad pa tshal ba bdun du 'gas //
T02TD1983E:170a-34: gur kum la sogs pa dang /
T02TD1983E:170a-35: bdud rtsi lnga bsres pa'i chu lag par byin te /
T02TD1983E:170a-36: 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu //
T02TD1983E:170a-37: dam tshig nyams na sreg par byed //
T02TD1983E:170a-38: dam tshig bsrung na dngos grub thob //
T02TD1983E:170a-40: aom badzra aa mri ta h'um zhes dam bdar ro //
T02TD1983E:170a-41: de'i rjes la dam tshig thun mong ma yin pa 'di smra bar bya ste /
T02TD1983E:170a-42: dus 'di nyid nas bu khyod kyi /
T02TD1983E:170a-43: rdo rje 'dzin pa nga yin te //
T02TD1983E:170a-44: nga yis ji ltar bka' stsal te //
T02TD1983E:170a-45: khyod kyis skyo ba med par gyis //
T02TD1983E:170a-46: gang yang nga la ma mos min //
T02TD1983E:170a-47: de bzhin mos par ma byas na //
T02TD1983E:170a-48: bdud kyis bcom nas dmyal bar 'gro //
T02TD1983E:170b-0: de bas dam tshig gnas @170b par gyis //
T02TD1983E:170b-1: mna' chu blud pa'i rim pa'o /
T02TD1983E:170b-3: // / de nas slob ma 'od dpag tu med par bsgom pa la sogs pa'i rim pas gzhan nas bstan pas dbab par bya'o //
T02TD1983E:170b-5: ji ltar bsod nams ji bzhin lha'i //
T02TD1983E:170b-6: rigs kyi bye brag 'di la yang //
T02TD1983E:170b-7: rigs kyi nang na 'di bzang ngo //
T02TD1983E:170b-8: de yi dngos grub 'dir byung nas //
T02TD1983E:170b-12: pra t'itstsha badzra ho zhes lan gsum brjod de dor ro //
T02TD1983E:170b-13: lha gang la babs pa dang /
T02TD1983E:170b-14: lus kyi stod smad la sogs pa'i bye brag las dngos grub bzang ngan dag 'byung par shes par bya ste /
T02TD1983E:170b-15: me tog ltas kyi rim pa'o //
T02TD1983E:170b-17: rdo rje 'dzin pas de ring nyid //
T02TD1983E:170b-18: khyod ni ye shes mig phye ste //
T02TD1983E:170b-19: de bzhin thams cad mthong bar gyis //
T02TD1983E:170b-20: aom dzny'a tsakshu pra be sha phat /
T02TD1983E:170b-21: des brjodnas rang gsal ba'i sgo nas gtso bo la thung par bstan te /
T02TD1983E:170b-22: dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1983E:170b-23: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi bum pa dag chu gcig tu byas te /
T02TD1983E:170b-24: des slob ma'i spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba sbyin te /
T02TD1983E:170b-25: aom badzra aa bhi shinyts'a mi /
T02TD1983E:170b-26: zhes spyi bor chu blugs pas /
T02TD1983E:170b-27: rigs kyi bdag po mi bskyod pas mgo brgyan par bsam mo //
T02TD1983E:170b-28: de nas dbu rgyan stong pa nyid mngon du byas nas /
T02TD1983E:170b-29: aom h'um a'im dzr'am kham lnga las rigs lnga bskyed de /
T02TD1983E:170b-30: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga po dag der gzhug par byas nas slob ma'i mgo la bzhag nas /
T02TD1983E:170b-31: aom ratna ku la mu ku ta aa bhi shinyts'a mi /
T02TD1983E:170b-33: dbu rgyan gyi dbang bskur ba'o //
T02TD1983E:170b-34: de nas rdo rje stong pa nyid las pam las 'od dpag tu med par bskyed nas 'od dpag tu med par bcug la /
T02TD1983E:170b-35: de gyur pa las rdo rjer gyur pas dbang bskur bar bya ste /
T02TD1983E:170b-36: aom badzra aa bhi shi nyts'a mis lag pa g-yas par rdo rje sbyin no //
T02TD1983E:170b-37: de nas dril bu yang snga ma bzhin //
T02TD1983E:170b-38: aa mo gha siddhir bskyed pa dang /
T02TD1983E:170b-39: gzhug pa byas te gyur pas dbang sbyin te /
T02TD1983E:170b-40: lag pa g-yon par dril bu sbyin par bya ste /
T02TD1983E:170b-41: aom badzra aa dhi pa ti aa dhi shinyts'a mi zhes bdag po'i dbang sbyin no //
T02TD1983E:170b-42: de nas rdo rje dang dril bu gnyis slob ma'i spyi bor bsnol te bzung la /
T02TD1983E:171a-0: ming gi dbang rnam par snang mdzad kyi rang bzhin chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin bdag @171a * //
T02TD1983E:171a-2: badzra n'a ma aa bhi shinytsa /
T02TD1983E:171a-4: kye dpal che ge mo zhes lha gang la bab pa'i zhabs kyis mtshan pa'i ming gi dbang sbyin no //
T02TD1983E:171a-5: dbang lnga po 'di ni rigs lnga'i dbang ngo //
T02TD1983E:171a-6: de nas slob dpon gyi dbang sbyin par bya ste /
T02TD1983E:171a-7: bdag dang gzhan gyi don byed pa ni rdo rje slob dpon gyi dbang yin te /
T02TD1983E:171a-8: thugs rje'i bdag pos stsal du gsol zhes zhu'o //
T02TD1983E:171a-9: de nas h'um las rdo rjer bsgoms te /
T02TD1983E:171a-10: thog ma tha ma med sems dpa'i //
T02TD1983E:171a-11: rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che //
T02TD1983E:171a-12: kun du bzang po thugs kyi bdag / rdo rje snying po thugs kyi gtso //
T02TD1983E:171a-14: de nas aa las dril bu bskyed de /
T02TD1983E:171a-15: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD1983E:171a-17: rtag par khyod kyis bzung ba yin //
T02TD1983E:171a-18: rgyal ba'i byang chub mchod par gyis //
T02TD1983E:171a-19: zhes lag pa g-yon par sbyin no //
T02TD1983E:171a-20: srid pa'i tshig dag brjod de des dkrol lo //
T02TD1983E:171a-21: de nas slob ma yi dam gyi lha'i sku phyag rgya bsgom pa byin te sku'i dbang sbyin no //
T02TD1983E:171a-22: de nas gzhal yas khang gi rnam par dag pa dang lha'i rnam par dag pa bshad nas /
T02TD1983E:171a-23: de nas gnang pa sbyin te /
T02TD1983E:171a-24: 'jig rten khams ni ma lus par //
T02TD1983E:171a-27: de nas brtul zhugs sbyin par bya ste /
T02TD1983E:171a-28: 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD1983E:171a-29: rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag na gnas //
T02TD1983E:171a-30: rtag par khyod kyis gzung bar gyis //
T02TD1983E:171a-31: phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs yin //
T02TD1983E:171a-32: rdo rje byin nas brtul zhugs brtan pa'o //
T02TD1983E:171a-33: de nas slob dpon sangs rgyas kyi skur bskyed de /
T02TD1983E:171a-34: bla gos kyi mtha' ma g-yon pas bzung ba'i khu tshur snying gar bzung bas /
T02TD1983E:171a-35: g-yas pa mchog sbyin du byas la lung bstan par bya ste /
T02TD1983E:171a-36: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang 'phags pa rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu /
T02TD1983E:171a-37: rdo rje 'dzin pa lung bstan gyis //
T02TD1983E:171a-38: sngags kyi dngos grub dang bar gyis //
T02TD1983E:171a-39: zhes lung bstan pa sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD1983E:171a-40: de nas skyabs sbyin byas te /
T02TD1983E:171a-41: 'dod chags bral ba lta bu yi //
T02TD1983E:171a-42: khams gsum na yang sdig med de //
T02TD1983E:171a-43: de bas 'dod la chags bral bas //
T02TD1983E:171a-44: khyod kyis nam yang ma byed cig / bde chen theg pa 'di la ni //
T02TD1983E:171a-45: phyi nas shi ba yod med de //
T02TD1983E:171a-46: sdug bsngal srid la mya ngan 'das //
T02TD1983E:171b-0: srid pa brtan @171b du dngos grub 'gyur //
T02TD1983E:171b-1: rang ba dag yongs su dor nas ni //
T02TD1983E:171b-2: dka' thub spyad par mi bya ste //
T02TD1983E:171b-3: ji ltar bde bar bzung nas ni //
T02TD1983E:171b-4: sangs rgyas dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
T02TD1983E:171b-5: de ltar slob dpon dkyil 'khor ni //
T02TD1983E:171b-6: sngags dang rgyud kyi phrin las can //
T02TD1983E:171b-7: sangs rgyas dang ni byang chub sems //
T02TD1983E:171b-8: snying rje'i dbang gis sems can don //
T02TD1983E:171b-9: khyod kyis dkyil 'khor cho ga dag / brtson par bri dang rgyud la ni //
T02TD1983E:171b-10: nyan dang bsgrub pa dag tu gyis //
T02TD1983E:171b-15: rol mo'i bye brag gis bskor ba dang //
T02TD1983E:171b-17: dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams rang gi snying gar bkod pa byas nas /
T02TD1983E:171b-18: nang gi sbyin sreg gis tshim par bya'o //
T02TD1983E:171b-21: shes rab dang ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba ni /
T02TD1983E:171b-22: bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya'o //
T02TD1983E:171b-23: dpal 'jam pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga slob dpon chen po dpal don yod pa'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD1983E:171b-26: lo ts'a ba rdo rje grags kyis bsgyur ba'o//
